The "Eternal Flame" - a monumental fire sculpture that represents the enduring flame of human creativity and inspiration.
The "Mystic Cavern" - a hidden underground oasis with a mysterious atmosphere and breathtaking natural beauty.
The "Celestial Observatory" - a futuristic, multi-story structure that houses the world's most advanced telescopes and observatories.

The "Solar Ark" - a massive, floating ship-like structure that symbolizes the interconnectedness of all life on Earth and serves as a reminder of our responsibility to protect and preserve our planet's natural resources.
